title: Patrick O'Shaughnessy on Custom Indexing and the Portfolio of You
description: The founder of Canvas discusses how technology has powered the evolution of the index fund to direct indexing and now custom indexing.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: The founder of Canvas discusses how technology has powered the evolution of the index fund to direct indexing and now custom indexing.
